name: Tycoon Life
description:
Starting your own business at the age of 20, can you become a business tycoon?
Trading bitcoins, gold, domain names, vapes…
Starting AI company, retail chained store, instagram model agency…
Dating head of cheer leader, celebrity, sweet nurse or business tycoon…
Raising kids, helping them get education, work, and starting their own business.
Running football club, oil plants, and research institutes.

Business insight, management strategy, and incredible courage,
Experience the real life of a startup!
